Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class Pin

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.hardware.Pin
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pin.Ground, Pin.Power
    public class Pin
extends Object
    An implementation of an actual IC pin.
    Since:
    2019-11-06
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania

      Inner private class for power pin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pin()
      Initializes isolated pin without the name.
      Pin​(Pin.Direction direction)
      Initializes nameless pin with given direction.
      Pin​(Pin.Direction direction, Pin.Level level)
      Initializes nameless pin with given direction and initial level.
      Pin​(String name)
      Initializes isolated pin with given name.
      Pin​(String name, Pin.Direction direction)
      Initializes the pin with given name and direction.
      Pin​(String name, Pin.Direction direction, Pin.Level level)
      Initializes the pin with given name, direction and initial level.
      Pin​(String name, Pin.Direction direction, Pin.Level level, boolean pullUp)
      Initializes the pin with full customization.

    • Field Detail

      • VCC

        public static final Pin VCC
        Power pin.
        Always stays at Pin.Level.HIGH level.

      • GND

        public static final Pin GND
        Ground pin.
        Always stays at Pin.Level.LOW level.

        private final String name
        Name of the pin.
